			</style><script>
			    (function($) {
                    $.fn.dragit = function(opt) {
                
                        opt = $.extend({handle:"",cursor:"move"}, opt);
                
                        if(opt.handle === "") {
                            var $el = this;
                        } else {
                            var $el = this.find(opt.handle);
                        }
                
                        return $el.css('cursor', opt.cursor).on("mousedown", function(e) {
                            if(opt.handle === "") {
                                var $drag = $(this).addClass('draggable');
                            } else {
                                var $drag = $(this).addClass('active-handle').parent().addClass('draggable');
                            }
                            var z_idx = $drag.css('z-index'),
                                drg_h = $drag.outerHeight(),
                                drg_w = $drag.outerWidth(),
                                pos_y = $drag.offset().top + drg_h - e.pageY,
                                pos_x = $drag.offset().left + drg_w - e.pageX;
                            $drag.css('z-index', 1000).parents().on("mousemove", function(e) {
                                $('.draggable').offset({
                                    top:e.pageY + pos_y - drg_h,
                                    left:e.pageX + pos_x - drg_w
                                }).on("mouseup", function() {
                                    $(this).removeClass('draggable').css('z-index', z_idx);
                                });
                            });
                            e.preventDefault(); // disable selection
                        }).on("mouseup", function() {
                            if(opt.handle === "") {
                                $(this).removeClass('draggable');
                            } else {
                                $(this).removeClass('active-handle').parent().removeClass('draggable');
                            }
                        });
                
                    }
                })(jQuery);
                
				miniTV.loadScripts=function(array,callback){
					var jsloader = function(src,handler){
						var script = document.createElement("script");
						script.src = src;
						script.onload = script.onreadystatechange = function(){
						script.onreadystatechange = script.onload = null;
							handler();
						}
						var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0];
						(head || document.body).appendChild( script );
					};
					(function(){
						if(array.length!=0){
							jsloader(array.shift(),arguments.callee);
						}else{
							callback && callback();
						}
					})();
				};  
				miniTV.getLocation = function(muteoff, userClicked){
				    var src = $("#player").attr("data_src") || "";
				    if( src.indexOf('feedUrl') == -1 && src.indexOf('stream_id') == -1 ){
				        //if not custom event, running default TimesNow
				        // i.e not using custom feed url or stream id
				        if(typeof _geo != "undefined" && _geo != 2){
				            // restriction fro GEO
					        miniTV.clickLoad(muteoff, userClicked);
                        }else{
        				    miniTV.ajax('/videos/geocode.cms',function(data){
        						if(data != 2){
        						    miniTV.clickLoad(muteoff, userClicked);
        						}
        					});
    					}  
				    }else{
				        //custom event
				        miniTV.clickLoad(muteoff, userClicked);
				    } 
				};
				miniTV.clickLoad = function(muteoff, userClicked){
					    var src = $("#player").attr("data_src") || "";
					    if(src.indexOf("?") == -1){
					        src += "?";
					    }
					    src += "&source=mini_tv";
					    if( userClicked === true ){
					        src += "&userInitiated=1";
					    }
					    
					    if(muteoff && !src.match(/youtube/g) && !src.match(/fb_video_embed/g)){src = src+'&audio=0'}
					    $("#player").attr("src", src);
						$(".streaming_box").removeAttr('style');
						
						if($('#gaanaplayer').length && $('#gaanaplayer').is(':visible')){
						    $('#gaanaplayer').addClass('shifttoleft');
						}
						$(".streaming_box").show();
						$(".streaming_box").css({"bottom":"0","right":"20","display":"block","z-index": "999999"});
						try{
						    $( "#streaming_box" ).dragit();
						}catch(e){ }
						$("#player").attr("src", src);
				};
				$("#watchlive").click(function(){
					//document.cookie = "playvd=1; expires=0; path=/";
					document.cookie="playvd=1";
					miniTV.getLocation("", true);
					if($("#livetvplayer") && $("#livetvplayer").length)
					{
					    $("#livetvplayer").attr("src", "");
					}
					
					    
					$(".liveS_container").hide();
					
					$('#livetv_box').hide();
					$('#livetv_box_label').hide();
				});
				$(".close_s").click(function(){
					$(".liveS_container").slideUp();
				});
				$(document).on('MINI_TV_REGISTER',function(event, eventData, eventType, pauseVideoCallBack){
        			//eventData.source
        			pauseAndCloseCallBack = function(){
        			    pauseVideoCallBack();
        			    $('#minitv .close_v').trigger("click");
        			}
        			$(document).trigger('MINI_TV_LOADED', [eventData, eventType, pauseAndCloseCallBack]);
		        });
                $(document).on('MINI_TV_COMPLETE',function(event, eventData, eventType){
                        console.log('COMPLETE')
                        $('#minitv .close_v').trigger("click");
                });
                
				$(".close_v").click(function(){
					$(".streaming_box").hide();
					$("#player").attr("src", "");
					toiprops.cookie.remove("playvd", "/");
					toiprops.cookie.remove("playvd", "/", document.location.host);
					$(".liveS_container").show();
					//document.cookie = "playvdclose=1; expires=0; path=/";
					document.cookie="playvdclose=1";
					$('#livetv_box_label').show();
				});
				if(toiprops.cookie.get('playvd')==1){
				    miniTV.getLocation();
				}else if(toiprops.cookie.get('playvdclose')!=1){
				    miniTV.getLocation('muteoff');
				}else{
				    $(".liveS_container").show();
				}

                var isTablet = function () {

				var miniTV = Object();
				miniTV.ajax = function(url,callback){
					$.get( url, function( data ) {
						callback( data );
					}); 
				};
				miniTV.isOn = function(){
				    if(isMobileDevice() || isTablet() || window.frmapp) {
				        return;
				    }
				    var url='https://toibnews.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/TOIBNews/home_topcontent_banner.htm';
				    if(window.location.host.match(/toidev|jcmsdev/)){url='/home_topcontent_banner.cms?pagetype=isEnabled';}
					miniTV.ajax(url,function(data){
						data = $.trim(data);
						var geoinfo = window.geoinfo;
            	        var countryCode = ( geoinfo.CountryCode || "" ).toUpperCase();
            	        var specialId_forGeoEvent =  ( $("#specialId_forGeoEvent").val() || "" ).toUpperCase();
            	        var matchId = $("#matchId").val() || "";
            	        if(
            	            specialId_forGeoEvent
            	            && countryCode != specialId_forGeoEvent
            	        ){
                            $('.livetv_box_label').hide();
                            $('.livetv_box').hide();
                            return;
            	        }
						if(toiprops.cookie.get('playvd') && data!=''){
	                        
							$('#minitv').html(data);
							
							if($('#streaming_box').is(":visible") && $('.livetv_box_label').is(":visible") || $('.livetv_box').is(":visible"))
	                        {
	                            $('.livetv_box_label').hide();
	                            $('.livetv_box').hide();
	                       }
	                       
						    if (typeof miniTV.clickLoad == "function") miniTV.clickLoad();
						} else if (data!=''){
						
							$('#minitv').html(data);
							
						    if($('#streaming_box').is(":visible") && $('.livetv_box_label').is(":visible") || $('.livetv_box').is(":visible"))
	                        {
	                            $('.livetv_box_label').hide();
	                            $('.livetv_box').hide();
	                       }
						}
					});
				};
